SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, HIBBS_PARENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, HIBBS_PARENT FROM (SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, NVL(HIBBS_GROUP, '') AS HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(HIBBS_ORDER, '') AS HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(HIBBS_INDENT, '') AS HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(HIBBS_READ_CNT, '') AS HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(HIBBS_PARENT, '') AS HIBBS_PARENT FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(TIBBS_TITLE, '') > 0
ORDER BY A.HIBBS_GROUP DESC, A.HIBBS_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
